Plot: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?
Title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
Writer: Dhani Lipsius (story), Larry Rattner (story), Benjamin Ruffner (story), Alan B. McElroy (story), Alan B. McElroy (screenplay)
Actors: Donald Pleasence, Ellie Cornell, Danielle Harris, George P. Wilbur
